content.raw:
I think I’ve managed to merge the style fixes [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/commits/e96f5618a7311791a71c29a30c8f2d71a0862304?at=mv_gtest).

Thanks for testing the `ign-plugin` PRs! "Part 2" will be the easiest for a current user to port to since it's mostly just changing a few names. However, whichever library uses the `ignition::plugin::Loader` class should link to the `ignition-plugin0::loader` cmake target rather than the `ignition-plugin0::core`.

However, I don't actually expect anyone to use the implementation in "Part 2". It's really just a stepping stone for getting to "Part 3" which provides some major improvements to plugin API and registration. At some point I should write a migration guide for porting from `ign-common` to `ign-plugin` "Part 3", but I might not have time for that today.
content.html:
I think I’ve managed to merge the style fixes here.

Thanks for testing the ign-plugin PRs! "Part 2" will be the easiest for a current user to port to since it's mostly just changing a few names. However, whichever library uses the ignition::plugin::Loader class should link to the ignition-plugin0::loader cmake target rather than the ignition-plugin0::core.

However, I don't actually expect anyone to use the implementation in "Part 2". It's really just a stepping stone for getting to "Part 3" which provides some major improvements to plugin API and registration. At some point I should write a migration guide for porting from ign-common to ign-plugin "Part 3", but I might not have time for that today.
